user.title: Porkbun API Credentials
user.description: Enter your Porkbun API key and secret key. You can create these at porkbun.com/account/api.

domain.title: Domain Configuration
domain.description: Configure the domain and optional subdomains for DDNS updates. The root domain is always included.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Porkbun
reauth_confirm.description: Your API credentials are no longer valid. Please enter new credentials.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to reach the Porkbun API. Please check your network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key or secret key. Please check your credentials.
error.domain_not_found: Domain not accessible with these API keys. Ensure API access is enabled for this domain in your Porkbun dashboard.

api_access_disabled.title: API access not enabled for {domain}
api_access_disabled.description:
The Porkbun API returned an error for **{domain}**. Please ensure API access is enabled in your Porkbun domain settings.

Without API access enabled, DDNS updates cannot be performed.
